description:
A Scub Burst occurs in the state of Arizona. Political complications keep Pied Piper on the sidelines while Truth`s meddling creates a dangerous situation for Ao and Ivica.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Release Yourself (The Pied Piper of Hamelin)
リリース・ユア・セルフ (the pied piper of Hamelin)
